pddl4j.graphplan
Class Fact

java.lang.Object
  pddl4j.exp.AbstractExp
      pddl4j.exp.AtomicFormula
          pddl4j.graphplan.Fact
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<pddl4j.exp.term.Term>, pddl4j.exp.Exp, pddl4j.exp.InitEl, pddl4j.exp.Literal
public final class Fact
extends pddl4j.exp.AtomicFormula

This class implements the internal representation of a fact for the graphplan planner.

See Also:
